property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have at least 1 Dragon or Angel Command in your graveyard you may cast 1 spell from your hand with "Shield Trigger" without cost. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast a multi-colored spell, or summon a multi-colored creature, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Over Drive Water x4 (When this creature is summoned, you may tap 4 extra Water cards. If so, it gains the following [OD] ability.) [OD]: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, reveal the top card of your opponent's deck. If that card is a Spell, you may cast it without paying the cost, and put it into its owner's Graveyard. If that card is not a Spell, put it on the bottom of your opponent's deck. Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker When this creature attacks, you may put one of your Shields into your Graveyard. If so, destroy an opponent's creature with Power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may summon multicolor creatures from your Mana Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the Mana Zone tapped. Lost Prism (When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, reveal the top card from your deck. If that card is a multi-colored card, add it to your hand.) Double Breaker Whenever you draw a card, reveal that card. If that card is a Light card, during this turn, whenever this creature would be destroyed, it stays in the Battle Zone instead. If that card is a Darkness card, choose 1 of your opponent's creatures in Battle Zone. This turn, the chosen creature gets -2000 Power. (Creatures with 0 Power or less are destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the Mana Zone tapped. Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.) Speed Attacker (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) When this creature wins a Battle, you may untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the Mana Zone tapped. When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, destroy an opponent's creature with Power 6000 or less. property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the Mana Zone tapped. Lost Prism (When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, reveal the top card from your deck. If that card is a multi-colored card, add it to your hand.) When this creature is destroyed, look at your deck. From there you may choose up to 2 Nature or Water creatures with cost 3 or less and put them into the Battle Zone. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the Mana Zone tapped. This creature gains Power +2000 for each creature in your Graveyard. This creature cannot attack opponent player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, search your deck for a Nature Spell, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. God Link - God Earth Leopard (You may link this card to the chosen God in the Battle Zone. The Linked Gods becomes one creature with each God's abilities (power and effect). When it leaves the Battle Zone, choose either one.) While this creature is linked, when an opponent chooses a creature, your opponent cannot choose this creature. (However, this card can be blocked when attacking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of attacking, you may tap this creature and 8 untapped cards in your Mana Zone to use the following [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Choose a civilization other than Water and reveal the top 2 cards from your deck. You may put a card with the chosen civilization into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is blocked, opponent discards his/her hand. Double Breaker God Link - Dragon Ultimate God Metsu (You can link this card to the chosen God in the Battle Zone. property.name: Rules

Double Breaker When your last Shield would be broken, draw a card before breaking the Shield. During that turn, creatures cannot attack you.
